Description: FindEmails discovers business email addresses from the first and last names, and the company name or website. It uses millions of business email patterns and mail server results to give you industry-leading sending rates.
Name: FindEmails

Methods.Name: Get Prospects
Methods.Description: This endpoint delivers the prospects in our database based on company name or website.

Methods.Name: Guess Emails
Methods.Description: This endpoint discovers emails based on the first name, last name, and company name.

Methods.Name: Test Email
Methods.Description: This endpoint delivers our confidence score for a given email address.

MetaTile: Integrate Toofr - Data Enhancement Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Integrate Toofr's powerful email address discovery technology with your business apps such as your CRM & marketing platforms.
